#### The mental health and well-being benefits derived from nature are a globally important cultural ecosystem service. #### But the way in which this happens - and specific contributions of different elements of biodiversity - are not well understood. #### Sound plays a key role in our experience of nature, with bird song in particular providing the soundtrack to time spent outdoors. #### This project combines ecoacoustics with approaches from environmental psychology and economics to better understand the relationships between landscape structure, soundscape complexity, perceptions of soundscape quality, derived mental health and well-being benefits, and economic values.
